values:
I've never been here before... The people here are strange. I don't like it.

I want to go home. Where is Father?

[[ooc: He's about five right now, and even more blunt as a mini <3. And ignore the orange; it was the only pic of Kyouya I could find as a little kid :3.]]
I didn't know such strange events could be so calming. The fish, the fireflies- whoever created this world seems to have a niche for the surreal.

You know, it'd be nice if we had some candles or flashlights here in the dorm. I'd buy some myself, but I can't exactly go out in this weather. 

... <s>Can't get any damn sleep. When the hell is this thunder going to stop!?</s>



[[Strike partly legible because he's dead tired and ticked off.]]
How flowers managed to bloom on the surface of my laptop I will never know. At least they're gone now.
Ah. it's Mother's day. Well... happy Mothers day to all the mothers in Avoria.

... You know, I really should have expected something like this. 

I've seen multiple- Hm. Dopplegangers? Clones? Really, I'm rather unsure of how to refer to them, but there seems to have been a huge influx of residents and visitors in Avoria as of late. I think I've seen myself more than once. I can't help but wonder whether this is permanent or a mere temporary instability of this world, but either way it's... surreal, to put it best. 

Kaoru, Hikaru, I've seen the two of you more than anybody else.

That... was absolutely <s>humiliating terrifying really, really painful</s> chaotic. Although I'm looking at everybody and it seems that I got off easily, in the great scheme of things. 

Ah. And Haruhi : Thank you for protecting me from that <s>psychotic</s> woman and that cat... person. 

<s>I'm about three seconds away from doubling your debt, but I know it wasn't your fault. *disarming smile* 

Dear God, I've got scratches all over me... </s>

[[First two strikes illegible, other strike partially legible X3]]

[[The dots are tiny beeps]]

.... .. ... .... ...

.... .. ...........

... . ..........

. ..........

...

. ..... .... ..... ... .....


[[Yes, I turned him into a calculator. One, because I'm evil like that, and two, because  Kyouya=calculating and calculating=calculator. And my creativity=WIN, apparently. Anywho, seeing as he's a calculator VERY much against his will, he's spazzing out a bit.

In case you don't speak calculator, which I'm sure you don't, and if you do, do you give lessons:

"What in the hell is-

This is ridiculous. 

I'm a calculator.

A CALCULATOR.

...

I DIDN'T EVEN DRINK THE WATER."]]
